ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into bite size pieces
1 ¼ cups Italian seasoned bread crumbs

cookingTips: Cut chicken into uniform pieces so they cook evenly
Bake at 400°F for 12-15 minutes until golden and cooked through
For extra crispiness, place on a wire rack above the baking sheet
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach the cook how to bake breaded chicken for a healthier alternative to frying while maintaining crispiness.
